qas.question: What film festival will first air 'The BFG'?
In what month is Cannes held?
When will 'The BFG' be in most theaters?
In what month in 2010 did Dreamworks buy the rights to The BFG?
In what year was John Madden dropped from directing The BFG?
What was the first movie written by Melissa Mathison?
In what year did Spielberg become the director of The BFG?

context: Spielberg has filmed and is currently in post-production on an adaptation of <a0_0>Roald Dahl<a0_0/>'s celebrated children's story The BFG. Spielberg's DreamWorks bought the rights in <b6_0><b8_0>2010<b8_0/><b6_0/>, originally intending John Madden to direct. The film was written by <b7_0>E.T.<b7_0/> screenwriter <a1_0>Melissa Mathison<a1_0/> and is co-produced by Walt Disney Pictures, marking the first Disney-branded film to be directed by Spielberg. The BFG is set to premiere out of competition at the <a2_0>Cannes Film Festival<a2_0/> in <a3_0><b5_0>May<b5_0/><a3_0/> 2016, before its wide release in the US on <a4_0>July 1, 2016<a4_0/>.
